mapper.sql: select id, coach_name, coach_height, coach_weight, coach_header from coach
mapper.select: where coach_name like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or coach_height like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or coach_weight like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or coach_header like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into coach (coach_name, coach_height, coach_weight, coach_header) values (#{coachName}, #{coachHeight}, ${coachWeight}, ${coachHeader});
